title: Manage an Internal Candidate Application
description: A current employee has applied for an open position in another department.

tasks.description: Identify the internal candidate's application in the ATS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter sees the application and notes the candidate is a current employee.

tasks.description: Notify the employee's current manager of their application, per company policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter informs the current manager of the employee's interest in the new role.

tasks.description: Review the employee's internal performance history and tenure alongside their resume.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter considers both internal performance data and external experience during the screening process.
